pojo
Class VendorMap

java.lang.Object
  pojo.VendorMap

public class VendorMap
extends java.lang.Object

Vendor Map is a pojo class containing the business logic of mapping vendors to existing RFQs

Author:
SAMARJIT

Method Detail

debug

public void debug(int priority,
                  java.lang.String s)
Priority based logging is handled here where priority 0 means lowest and 5 is considered highest. Class level priority setting has been implemented to make testing easy on the basis of layers

s -

setlectAll

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> setlectAll(java.lang.String rfqid)
Selects all the entries of a mapping between RFQ and vendors that are currently there. It also gets type of notify information and email and print status

initialMap

public java.lang.String initialMap(java.lang.String rfqid,
                                   java.lang.String department,
                                   java.lang.String typenotify,
                                   java.lang.String suggestdelvtime)
Maps all the vendors that are possible to map to RFQ of a particular department. User can delete the unwanted mappings after this

Parameters:

updateTypeNotify

public java.lang.String updateTypeNotify(java.lang.String rfqid,
                                         java.lang.String vendorid,
                                         java.lang.String typenotify,
                                         java.lang.String indvstatus)
Type of Notification is updated like email or print and number of times the vendor has been notified. The information is kept is a textual format so that later new modes of notification eg.SMS can be added without any change in java code

Parameters:
rfqid -
vendorid -
typenotify -
indvstatus -
Returns:
